http:
  routers:
    adguard-router-http:
      rule: Host(`adguard.bourne.cloud`)
      service: adguard-service
    adguard-router-https:
      rule: Host(`adguard.bourne.cloud`)
      service: adguard-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    adguard-service:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://192.168.1.2"
          - url: "https://192.168.1.2"
